summary:
• Board Renewal: Three new independent non-executive directors appointed (Lindsay Wright, Vince Hawksworth, Tarek Robbiati).
  • Effective Dates: Wright joins 1 August 2025; Hawksworth and Robbiati join 1 October 2025.
  • Retirements: Gordon MacLeod steps down 1 September 2025; Sheridan Broadbent retires 1 October 2025 (due to conflict of interest).
  • Re-election: New directors will retire and seek re-election at November 2025 AGM.
  • No material financial, operational, or capital markets impact identified. Purely governance update.

Omitted: Director bios, quotes, and routine procedural details.
